I'm Sahar, currently a PhD Candidate at the [Technion â€“ Israel Institute of Technology](https://www.technion.ac.il) in collaboration with [Nvidia Research](https://research.nvidia.com/labs/par/) under the supervision of Prof. Ofra Amir and Dr. Assaf Hallak.
